ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13

Class InterfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13.InterfaceView

  • public class InterfaceView
extends java.lang.Object
    Class method The InterfaceView class creates the GUI of the Fitbit program It also implements page navigation between the different screens

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method implements the GUI of the fibit program. The frame is the foundation, making up the whole window that holds the ContentPane. The ContentPane holds the CardLayout and the MenuBar toolbar. The Cardlayout contains multiple different panels which make up different screens of the program. The Cardlayout allows page navigation between these panels, by setting the visibility of every screen. The MenuBar is a tooldbar menu holding the buttons used for page navigation. This method sets up the prame and panels, then calls other methods for each screen and the menu.

      • menuBar

        private void menuBar()
        This method implements the buttons used for page navigation. The buttons are held in a toolbar.

      • setHeartRateZonesFields

        public void setHeartRateZonesFields(int minutes,
                                    int rate,
                                    int cardio_max,
                                    int fatburn_max,
                                    int peak_max,
                                    int cardio_min,
                                    int fatburn_min,
                                    int peak_min,
                                    int cardio_minutes,
                                    int fatburn_minutes,
                                    int peak_minutes,
                                    int oor_max,
                                    int oor_min,
                                    int oor_minutes)
        Sets JLabel values for Heart Rate Zones page with data from HeartRateRecord. Called when "Heart Rate Zones" menu button is clicked, as defined in HRZController. For now, zones will be left out (hardcoded in currently)
        Parameters:
        minutes - total minutes in all heart rate zones
        rate - resting heart rate
        cardio_max - cardio max value for zone
        fatburn_max - fat burn max value for zone
        peak_max - peak max value for zone
        cardio_min - cardio min value for zone
        fatburn_min - fatburn min value for zone
        peak_min - peak min value for zone
        cardio_minutes - cardio minutes value for zone
        fatburn_minutes - fatburn minutes value for zone
        peak_minutes - peak minutes value for zone
        oor_max - out of range max value for zone
        oor_min - out of range min value for zone
        oor_minutes - out of range minutes value for zone

      • setLifetimeTotalsFields

        public void setLifetimeTotalsFields(double distance,
                                    int floors,
                                    int steps)
        Sets JLabel values for Lifetime Totals page with data from LifetimeRecord. Called when "Lifetime Totals" menu button is clicked, as defined in LifetimeController.
        Parameters:
        distance - lifetime total for distance traveled
        floors - lifetime total for floors climbed
        steps - lifetime total for steps taken

      • setDailyDashFields

        public void setDailyDashFields(java.lang.String date,
                               double distance,
                               int calories,
                               int floors,
                               int steps,
                               int veryActMin,
                               int sedenteryMin)
        Sets JLabel values for Daily Dashboard page with data from DailyRecord Called when application is first loaded and when "Daily Dashboard" menu button is clicked, as defined in DailyDashboardController.
        Parameters:
        date - date information was updated
        distance - distance traveled on date last updated
        calories - total calories burned on date last updated
        floors - total floors climbed on date last updated
        steps - total steps taken on date last updated
        veryActMin - total "very active minutes" on date last updated
        sedenteryMin - toal "sedentary minutes" on date last updated

      • setBestDaysFields

        public void setBestDaysFields(double distance,
                              int floors,
                              int steps,
                              java.lang.String dist_date,
                              java.lang.String floors_date,
                              java.lang.String steps_date)
        Sets JLabel values for Best Days page with data from BestDaysRecord Called when "Best Days" menu button is clicked, as defined in BestDaysController.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance traveled on best day for distance
        floors - floors climbed on best day for floors
        steps - steps taken on best day for steps
        dist_date - date of farthest distance traveled
        floors_date - date of most floors climbed
        steps_date - date of most steps taken

      • addClickListenerLifetimeTotals

        public void addClickListenerLifetimeTotals(java.awt.event.ActionListener actionsOnClick)
        Attaches an ActionListner object to the Lifetime Totals menu button, which executes InterfaceView#setLifetimeTotalsFields(double, int, int) upon button click event.
        Parameters:
        actionsOnClick - ActionListener object defined in LifetimeController
